ing: 1 large head iceberg lettuce - rinsed, dried, and chopped
1 (5 ounce) can tuna, drained and flaked
des: "This is a great salad, especially for the summer.  My boyfriend loves it!"
ins: In a large bowl, whisk together the mayonnaise and salt.  Stir in the lettuce, onion, tomato and tuna until all ingredients are coated.  Enjoy!
